text: Would like to call it as SILO since category term creates confusion. I would like to create sitemap(s) for each SILO and its related blog pages. Ideally I need those in Google Search Console to segregate and split my team to work on individual SILO. For example I need <https://example.com/mysilo1/mysilo1_index.xml> and <https://example.com/mysilo2/mysilo2_index.xml> and so on.
Then you can use a crawler such as Screaming Frog to crawl the path <https://example.com/mysilo1/> and generate a site map then do the remaining silos <https://example.com/mysilo2/>.
Is there any way to automate the crawl part ?
